how.title: How it works
how.step1.title: 1. Create your card
how.step1.body: Add allergies, conditions, meds, and ICE contacts. Everything lives securely on your device.
how.step2.title: 2. Link your tag
how.step2.body: Connect a wristband, keychain, sticker or widget. A quick scan shows your info instantly.
how.step3.title: 3. Share in seconds
how.step3.body: ANERITA displays and voices the essentials so responders act faster — even offline.
faq.title: Common questions
faq.q1: Does it work without the internet?
faq.a1: Yes. Your emergency card is stored locally and can be displayed and spoken offline.
faq.a2: We do not track you. Your data is encrypted and stays on your device unless you choose to share it.
faq.a3: Absolutely — a simple scan opens your card; big text + audio highlight the critical details.
